name: Club Penguin Upo 1 Remastered 2021
description:
This Is A Remastered Version Of A Remastered Version Of My First Game. Act 1 Should Be Playable Along With Act 2. Escape Button Now Takes You Back To The Menu. Also Made The Bonus Halloween Level Playable. Play Ultimate Puffle Overload Mutation Crisis To Get To Know The Charecters. i do not own the rights to club penguin or puffles. this is a game i made for fun and is a fan game.

If I Ever Remake This Game Again It Will Have More Story And HD Graphics, Maybe Even Be 3d
